topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c7055e636872742b250e00#post_54c7055e636872742b250e00
[bq="gasmaskangel"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54c702af6368720777a80000#post_54c702af6368720777a80000
This. So, so much this.

Honestly the best counter argument to the "X is ruining Y!" argument (which is hardly contained to Japan, unfortunately) I've found is to make people state exactly what they want the people they're complaining about to do, and what them complying to their wishes will accomplish or explain exactly what their problem with X is in detail, and I mean full detail. Motherfuckers should be breaking out graphs and shit.

The goal of this exercise is to force people to bring logical thought to their prejudices, and while it doesn't always work it is a good way to get people to shut the fuck up.[/bq]
You want to know the other problem with Japan?  The older generations outright refuse to adapt technologically.  If you go work in Japan they still have punch cards and shit.  In this day and age a country refusing to integrate technological advancements in a business' work environment is a fucking death sentence.  You want to know why say the usa or europe next to nobody has punch cards still?  Cause all those businesses are dead.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
